20:27 <+sburjan> vmassol: hello. The issue about specifying a remote address implies commits both in patform an in enterprise. where should I create the according JIRA ?  
20:28 <vmassol> sburjan: since this is about the build and not about something runtime for end users you can just create one issue in XE…. it should be fine...  
20:28 <vmassol> (normally it'd be one issue for platform and one for enterprise)  
20:28 <vmassol> for platform it's the "test" component  
20:28 <+sburjan> yes, this is why I was asking  
20:29 <+sburjan> thanks.. creating the issue and preparing the pull requests
